[LIVE Meetings](javascript:;)

The Town Council of the Town of Anthony, Texas shall convene its regularly scheduled meetings on the second Wednesday of each month at 5:00 p.m. and on the fourth Wednesday of each month at 5:00 p.m. at the Anthony Town Hall, 401 Wildcat Dr. Anthony, Texas. The second Wednesday for the month of November 2026 will be moved from Wed, November 11th to Thurs, November 12th due to Veteran’s Day Holiday.

Public Comment is always at the beginning of the meetings (2 minutes), if you are not able to attend a meeting, please submit your public comment in writing to City Clerk at varmendariz@townofanthonytx.org with your name and address.

Public Comment is always at the beginning of the meetings (2 minutes), if you are not able to attend a meeting, please submit your public comment in writing to City Clerk at varmendariz@townofanthonytx.org with your name and address.
